ComicInfo.Title: Starbuck; The White Slavers of Scrofula!; Marginal Incident; The Adventure of the Animated Government; Hidden Worlds Hidden Dreams; Clik!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The great science fiction/fantasy anthology series continues with a litany of stellar comics creators.
1) Editorial: Friedrich (1 page text article)
2) Starbuck: Chaykin (11 pages)
3) Linda Lovecraft: The White Slavers Of Scrofula!: Skrenes, Vosburg (10 pages)
4) Marginal Incident: Leialoha (8 pages)
5) Sherlock Duck: The Adventure Of The Animated Government: Smith (5 pages)
6) Earthprobe: Hidden Worlds, Hidden Dreams: Warwick, Marrs (11 pages)
7) Clik!: Workman (4 pages)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 10:13:23. [CVDB16186]
ComicInfo.Writer: Howard Chaykin, Mary Skrenes, Steve Leialoha, Bob Smith, Lee Marrs, Mal Warwick, John Workman, Mike Friedrich
ComicInfo.Penciller: Howard Chaykin, Mike Vosburg, Steve Leialoha, Bob Smith, Lee Marrs, John Workman, Bob Smith, Howard Chaykin, John Workman, Lee Marrs, Mike Vosburg, Steve Leialoha
ComicInfo.Inker: Howard Chaykin, Mike Vosburg, Steve Leialoha, Bob Smith, Lee Marrs, John Workman, Bob Smith, John Workman, Lee Marrs, Mike Vosburg, Steve Leialoha
ComicInfo.Letterer: Alan Kupperberg, Tom Orzechowski, Steve Leialoha, John Workman
ComicInfo.Characters: Clark Gable, Cody Starbuck, Greta Garbo, Linda Lovecraft, Marilyn Monroe
